channel.title: [508]Changing an item's name [508]
channel.description: Ok well I just made a special restore pot(took me a while but I finally figured out how to make one =] ) but anyways, I am using an energy potion as the object thingy, I tried to change the name from energy potion to special restore potion. I went into item.cfg and changed the examine info and the name both to Special_Restore_potion(dose number) but the only thing that changed is the examine info and not the name. How can I change the name?

item.title: [508]Changing an item's name [508]
item.dc:creator: @99range_k0 99range k0
item.description:
@99range_k0 wrote:

nope not a single potion in class8, lol oh well I just leave the name =
btw in a 508 what are the skill number things, like skill0 = attack. So whats the skill number for herblore, fletching, slayer, smithing, woodcutting, thieving, mining? Any ideas? btw thnx for atleast trying to help =)

Read full topic

item.title: [508]Changing an item's name [508]
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

it should be in your client aswell class8. so u need to change the name in class.8 client side items.cfg server side. and in some servers client.java has all the names.

GOOD LUCK!
